data.actual_result: There's a small delay before filters disappear, letting you insert twice if you're fast enough
data.expected_result: It should insert only one, **as the filter suggesions are supposed to disappear as soon as one is inserted**
data.short_description: Able to input a search filter twice in a row
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to any channel and tap Search - Quickly double tap on one of the four filters
